definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Conclusion Sufentanil can safe for heart valve replacement surgery.
sentences.chinese: 结论舒芬太尼可安全的用于心脏瓣膜置换手术。

sentences.english: On the current domestic remifentanil less evaluation in this regard.
sentences.chinese: 目前国内关于瑞芬太尼此方面的评价较少。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the small dose of fentanyl used in the clinical effect of painless gastroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察小剂量芬太尼用于无痛胃镜检查的临床效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pentazocine can prevent postoperative hyperalgesia induced by remifentanilbased anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 结论喷他佐辛可以预防瑞芬太尼麻醉术后痛觉过敏。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study and evaluate the formulation of bilayer oral mucoadhesive films of fentanyl.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备芬太尼双层口腔贴膜，并对其进行性能评价。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a HPLC method for determination of concentration of fentanyl in human plasma.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立高效液相色谱法测定芬太尼血药浓度的方法。

sentences.english: Cancer patients make up the majority of Fentanyl patch users.
sentences.chinese: 癌症病人弥补大部分芬太尼贴片使用者。

sentences.english: BACKGROUND To study the feasibility of remifentanil and C parked phenol on analgesicenteroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 探讨瑞芬太尼和丙泊酚应用于镇痛肠镜检查的可行性。

sentences.english: Small bolus doses of fentanyl were repeated to maintain reasonable levels of anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 重复给小剂量芬太尼以维持麻醉在适当的水平。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of remifentanil anesthesia in thyroidectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察瑞芬太尼在甲状腺手术中的应用效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion Moderate dosage of fentanyl was eligible for elderly patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论中等剂量芬太尼适用于老年心脏瓣膜患者。

sentences.english: Fentanyl is the narcotic of choice in the postoperative period for treating pain.
sentences.chinese: 芬太尼是疼痛治疗可以选择的麻醉药。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the pharmacokinetics of remifentanil in adult patients undergoing general anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价全麻下成年病人瑞芬太尼的药代动力学。

sentences.english: The Fentanyl patch has a potent narcotic, the opioid fentanyl .
sentences.chinese: 芬太尼贴片有一种强力麻醉剂，阿片类药物芬太尼。

sentences.english: The Fentanyl patch has a potent narcotic, the opioid fentanyl .
sentences.chinese: 芬太尼贴片有一种强力麻醉剂，阿片类药物芬太尼。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sufentanil anesthesia was safe and effective for patient undergoing heart valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 据此，笔者将舒芬太尼应用于心瓣膜置换术的麻醉。
